interpro.desc: E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase AMFR, Ube2g2-binding region

name: autocrine motility factor receptor

kegg.name: Protein processing in endoplasmic reticulum - Homo sapiens (human)

reactome.name: N-glycan trimming in the ER and Calnexin/Calreticulin cycle

summary: This locus encodes a glycosylated transmembrane receptor. Its ligand, autocrine motility factor, is a tumor motility-stimulating protein secreted by tumor cells. The encoded receptor is also a member of the E3 ubiquitin ligase family of proteins. It catalyzes ubiquitination and endoplasmic reticulum-associated degradation of specific proteins. [provided by RefSeq, Feb 2012].
